name: create-lp-with-pug-tailwindcss
description: npx command to set up a landing page project with pug and tailwindcss

scripts.start: npx tailwindcss -i src/input.css -o dist/style.css --watch | npx pug --watch src -o dist --pretty | npx cpx "images/**/*" build --watch
scripts.build:prod: rm -r dist; npm run build:html && npm run build:css && cp -r images/* dist

author: Jesse Wei
